bibl.title: Buried Linguistic Treasure in the Babatha Archive.

series.title: American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition

bibl.note: Introduction. - Papyrological Studies, Corpus Linguistics, and Register Theory. - Register Analysis of the Babatha Archive. - Mode of Discourse and Textual Semantic Component. - Tenor of Discourse and Interpersonal Semantic Component. - Field of Discourse and Ideational Semantic Component. - Conclusion.
